com.google.appinventor.server
Class OdeServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          com.google.appinventor.server.OdeServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
AndroidServlet, DownloadServlet, LogoutServlet, OdeRedirectServlet, ReceiveBuildServlet, TosServlet, UploadServlet, WebStartFileServlet, WebStartJnlpServlet
public abstract class OdeServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

Class supporting ODE servlets, which ODE servlets should subclass instead of HttpServlet. TODO(user): This class used to handle logging. For now it is left here as a placeholder in case we need to do something beyond what HttpServlet would do.

The class OdeRemoteServiceServlet serves an analogous purpose for GWT RPCs.

See Also:
